rewards.name: Aetherplume
grantsAbilities: slow fall
rewards.instructions: Throw this in the air and up to 4 creatures of your choice fall slowly for 1 minute. Single use.

rewards.name: Alchemist's Supplies
rewards.instructions:
It's up to you to harvest materials you think have alchemical properties. The materials are consumed on success or failure.

***Learning Formulas (T0).*** You can either choose to create a formula you already know, or experiment with learning a new one. Make a medium difficulty check. On a success, you learn and brew a new formula.

***Craft potion or poison (T0).*** Takes 1 hour. If trained, no check is required.

rewards.name: Blood Hunter
rewards.instructions:
You practice the forbidden art of hemocraft to cast blood curses. Your ability for this is AGI. You are trained in Blood Magic

***Pushing the limit.*** If you are out of wellspring, you can attempt to cast again. Make a check, DC + the feature's tier. On a failure, instantly drop to 0 AGI pool.

rewards.name: Con Artist's Pack
rewards.instructions: Contains a hooded lantern, tinderbox, crowbar, climbing kit, and 50 ft of rope

rewards.name: Cult Leader
rewards.instructions: Convince a person to make a pact with your patron and increase your max wellspring by 1

multiRewards.name: Vex
multiRewards.advantageMsg: on all checks against this target by you

rewards.name: Finger of the Viscount
grantsAbilities: duplicates one item less than 100 coins but not any of its magical properties

rewards.name: Herbal Distillation
grantsAbilities: negates the effects of living light spell fields

rewards.name: Hooded Lantern
rewards.instructions: Runs on flasks of lamp oil. Gives off light around it with a range of 1.

rewards.name: I Know a Guy
grantsAbilities: you know a guy
rewards.instructions: For any given objective, you might know a someone who can help. Roll a chance roll for one of the following specialties: Pickpocket (50%), Footpad or Fence (25%), Enforcer (10%), Informant (5%), Kingpin (1%). If you want to find another type of entrepreneur in the criminal arts, the DM will set the chance target. You can only roll once per objective.

rewards.name: Flask of oil
rewards.instructions: lasts 6 hours in lamp or lantern

rewards.name: Marks of the Thief
rewards.instructions:
You are trained in Thievery.

If you rob a building that has been marked by the local thieves guild, and then gift a valuable stolen item to that guild, you earn the thieves' marks of that city.

Each guild will tattoo you with two marks, each of which provides a feature.

rewards.name: Needle of Mending
grantsAbilities: repair a single break or tear as long as it is no larger than 1 foot

rewards.name: Orb of Depths Direction
rewards.instructions: This item can orient you while traveling underground.

rewards.name: Pilfer's Doorway
grantsAbilities: When inserted into any door’s lock, the door opens and becomes a portal to the Feywild

rewards.name: Songwriter
rewards.instructions: Take 1 hour to write a song about a recent adventure. Select an effect from a list the DM provides. You must give the song a name.

rewards.name: Splatterbeast Paint
rewards.instructions: Paints a splatterbeast (tier 0) into existence, single use

rewards.name: Warlock of Glomtili
rewards.instructions:
(passive) training: Glomtili Magic

You draw magic from Glomtili, the god of earth. They dream of your experiences, and power flows through you. You use your Social score for Glomtili powers.

***Pushing the limit.*** If you are out of wellspring, you can attempt to cast again. Make a check with a target of 10 + the feature's level. On a failure, instantly drop to 0 Social pool.

***Waking the kaiju.*** Displeasing Glomtili disturbs their slumber, and blocks your ability to cast spells until they are calmed.

rewards.name: Warlock of Vortun
rewards.instructions:
(passive) training: Vortun. You draw magic from Vortun, the god of fire. He dreams of your experiences, and power flows through you. You use your SOC score for Vortun powers.

***Pushing the limit.*** If you are out of wellspring, you can attempt to cast again. Make a check with a target of 10 + the feature's level. On a failure, instantly drop to 0 Social pool.

***Waking the dragon.*** Displeasing Vortun disturbs his slumber, and blocks your ability to cast spells until he is calmed.

rewards.name: Blind Fire Mark
rewards.disadvantageMsg: close your eyes and fire with disadvantage

rewards.name: Charm Person
rewards.instructions: Charm a creature who speaks your language. On a success, they regard you as a friendly acquaintance and you have advantage on social rolls with them. Ten minutes after the casting of the spell, they realize they were charmed and you have disadvantage. Costs 1 wellspring.
grantsAbilities: regard you as a friendly acquaintance

rewards.name: Crimson Chains
rewards.advantageMsg: all creatures have advantage to act against it

upcast.name: Upcast: Restrained
upcast.instructions: spend an additional 1 wellspring to increase the tier limit by 1

rewards.name: Enlarge / Reduce
rewards.advantageMsg: cause a creature to become  twice or half as big for one hour. They have advantage on actions when their new size is helpful

rewards.name: Golem Familiar
rewards.notes:
summon a tier 0 tiny golem

Your patron lends one of their tiny minions to follow your commands and keep an eye on you. When their pool hits zero, they disappear back to your patron. It takes an hour to summon them again with an elaborate ritual. Work the DM to make them.

rewards.name: Hare Trigger
rewards.instructions: If the enemy side goes before you in bullet time, you can roll an Agile check to take your turn before them. The target number based on the highest tier enemy.

rewards.name: Hellish Rebuke
rewards.instructions:
while defending, deal 2 points, costs 1 wellspring

You point your finger, and the creature that damaged you is momentarily surrounded by the flames of Vortun.

rewards.name: Inspiring Song
rewards.instructions: Grant a creature 3 inspiration. Each can be used whenever they choose to gain advantage on a  roll. A creature may only have 3 inspiration at a time and they expire on a full reset. Costs 1 wellspring.

rewards.name: Living Light Tuning Fork
grantsAbilities: hums in the presence of living light magic

rewards.name: Mirrogold
rewards.specificMsg: if you haven't upset Mirrogold in the past 7 days
rewards.instructions: Sentient pocket mirror. If you haven't upset Mirrogold in the past 7 days, increase max wellspring by 3.

rewards.name: Mystic Pebbles

multiRewards.name: Mystic Pebble
multiRewards.instructions: deals 2 points, ranged when used with a sling

rewards.instructions: You imbue 5 pebbles with magic. After a full reset, they become ordinary pebbles again.

rewards.name: No-Stones
grantsAbilities: can see through walls
rewards.instructions:
see through walls, costs 1 wellspring

You can use an action to speak the command word, "unturned" and turn it over so the flat side is pressed against a natural surface. When you do, the geode is fixed in place and projects a map above it, showing the layout of the area around it with a range of 3. It shows all walls, floors, and surfaces made of stone, natural metal, or earth.

To remove the geode, speak the command word again.

rewards.name: Pallo Aldo Sauce
rewards.instructions:
***Sample it.*** Try it to find out what this does.

***Chug the entire bottle.*** Gain a short-term madness effect but have permanent resistance to fire damage. Action, 1 use, consumable.
rewards.advantageMsg: actually resistance, I need to set this up

rewards.trainedMsg: Training in persuasion and deception of Seelie fey
rewards.name: Seelie Ambassador
Serving of Smarmalade
rewards.trainedMsg: Grants training in persuading and deceiving for 1 hour. If you are already trained, you roll with advantage

rewards.name: Shadowstep mark
rewards.instructions: as your move, teleport to a nearby zone, deal +1 on your next successful attack, costs 1 wellspring

rewards.name: Silence
grantsAbilities: create a sphere of silence in 1 zone
rewards.durationMsg: lasts until your next full reset or you dismiss it

rewards.name: Slumber Song
rewards.instructions: Put a creature to sleep. It cannot act or move. Make a check to maintain the effect if a creature attempts to help them. Costs 1 wellspring. JULIAN: This needs a name

rewards.name: Speaking Stone Carver
rewards.instructions: You can take an hour to carve a pair of speaking stones. All speaking stones are trinkets for you, but equipment for others.

multiRewards.name: Speaking Stones
multiRewards.instructions: Stones come in matching pairs, and are carved so they are easily distinguished. While you touch a stone, you can speak into it. The sound of your voice emits from the paired stone.

rewards.name: Speaking Stones
rewards.instructions: Stones come in matching pairs, and are carved so they are easily distinguished. While you touch a stone, you can speak into it. The sound of your voice emits from the paired stone.

rewards.name: Stone Step
rewards.notes: teleport up to 2 zones away, costs 1 wellspring

rewards.name: Trick Pony
rewards.instructions: Pantomime riding a horse, complete with self-made horse noises and a name for the mighty beast, and you will summon a steed (tier 0) for 24 hours. Costs 1 wellspring

rewards.name: Twin Shortswords
rewards.instructions: With their swift and nimble design, you can execute dual attacks simultaneously, dealing 2 points

rewards.name: Wall of Fire
rewards.specificMsg: if they move through the wall of fire
rewards.instructions: surround a zone with a wall of fire for 5 rounds. If they move through the wall of fire, deal 2 points, costs 1 wellspring

rewards.name: Blade of Narshok Anogrul
rewards.instructions: Choose one of the following

rewards.name: Spidersilk Gloves
rewards.trainedMsg: Sleight of Hand (picking locks, picking pockets, or performing other acts of manipulating small objects for the purpose of stealing)
rewards.notes: I'm making this specific because I think the training is too punishing on this one

rewards.name: Crossbow Bolts Bundle
rewards.instructions: When you roll a 1 on your skill die and fail, the bundle has run out of bolts.

rewards.name: Alchemist's Fire
rewards.notes: Ignites when thrown and shattered, Ranged, deal 1d4. Can take 1 action to put out, otherwise takes 1d4 on the end of their turn.

rewards.name: Candy Xorn
rewards.instructions:
Eating one causes your eyes to turn yellow and your pupils to match  the candy. You can see in darkness with a range of 2 for 1 minute. 

Each piece of candy xorn has a chance to not be candy at all, but actually a gemstone covered in the sugared coating. Roll d20, and on a 20 it is a gem. It can be either eye agate (40%, 10c), tiger's eye (40%, 10c), or amber (20%, 100c).
grantsAbilities: darkvision

rewards.name: Holy Water
rewards.specificMsg: only deals damage to unholy things

rewards.name: Recipe: Soothing Tea
rewards.instructions: heals 4 points across any mental pools, single use

rewards.name: Barrel
rewards.instructions: holds 40 gallons

rewards.name: Barrel of Oil
rewards.instructions: Requires d20 or d12 strength to lift this barrel. Must have 1 gear slot free to carry it, and can take no other actions while carrying it. Burns for 1920 hours in a lantern or lamp. When broken, covers a zone. If ignited, the flames deal 2 points to all creatures in a zone immediately and at the end of their turn as long as they are still in the zone.
rewards.specificMsg: requires d20 or d12 strength to lift this barrel

rewards.name: Conqueror
rewards.notes: When an object is used as a weapon, it deals 1 extra point and ignites combustible items. When a creature ignites, it takes 1 damage immediately and at the end of its turn unless the fire is put out with an action.

multiRewards.name: Ignite Weapon
grantsAbilities: on subsequent turns deal +1

multiRewards.name: Slow
grantsAbilities: decrease the target's speed by half

rewards.name: Amulet of Proof Against Detection and Location
grantsAbilities: While wearing this amulet, you cannot be perceived through magical scrying sensors or be a target of other divination spells.

rewards.name: Arcane Focus
rewards.instructions: An arcane focus is a special item — an orb, a crystal, a rod, a specially constructed staff, a wand-like length of wood, or some similar item — designed to channel the power of arcane spells.

rewards.name: Ball Bearings
rewards.instructions: single use, no roll required. Spill these tiny metal balls to cover a zone. When the first creature crosses over them, the creature falls down and takes 1 TOU damage.

rewards.name: Dazzleburst Crystal
rewards.instructions: A sharp blow to the crystal causes it to burst in a flash of blinding light. All creatures in a zone are blinded for 30 seconds. On a fail, it explodes in your hand and blinds you for 1 min. Single use.
grantsAbilities: blind all creatures in a zone

rewards.name: Flaming Arrow
rewards.instructions: Deals +2 damage. Single use, consumed only when it hits.

rewards.name: Minor Illusion
grantsAbilities: create a sound or image no larger than yourself

rewards.name: Tallow Candle
rewards.instructions: lasts 5 hours, lights a single creature's space

rewards.name: This is fine
rewards.instructions:
training: Fire

**Kill it with fire**. Getting the killing blow with fire pleases Vortun and soothes him in his slumber. Each person you kill with flame has a chance to unlock further power from Vortun, such as a new spell or feature.

rewards.name: Bug Collector
rewards.instructions:
You are trained in Collecting Bugs

**Find bug.** When you are in a new location, you can try to discover a new bug. Costs 1 wellspring. 

**Release bug.** Release a bug and make a medium-difficulty check. On success, the bug deals 4 points. On a failure, the bug was upset at being captured and you take half the points to your NTU pool. Bugs are single use, and releasing them costs 1 wellspring. Spend +1 wellspring to deal +1 point.

rewards.name: Dimebag of Primalumina
rewards.instructions: Try it, you'll like it.

rewards.name: Divine Sense
grantsAbilities: sense things inimical to your oath

rewards.name: Dungeoneer's Pack
rewards.instructions: Contains a climbing kit, 10 ft pole, crowbar, tinderbox, and 50 ft of rope

rewards.name: Shell Blessing
rewards.advantageMsg: grants advantage to defense to all creatures in your current zone for 10 minutes

rewards.name: Light Crystal
rewards.instructions: worth 20c

rewards.name: Thief's Pack
rewards.instructions: Contains thieves tools, a crowbar, bullseye lantern, tinderbox, climbing kit, traveler's clothes, and 50 ft of rope.

rewards.name: Tide Caller's Veil
grantsAbilities: breathe underwater
swim speed of 1

rewards.name: Explorer's Pack
rewards.instructions: Contains a tinderbox, mess kit, traveler's clothes, cold weather clothes, and 50 ft of rope

multiRewards.name: Vex
multiRewards.advantageMsg: on all checks against this target by you

rewards.name: Recipe: Angelic Rest
grantsAbilities: Gain a full reset

rewards.name: Druidcraft
rewards.instructions: Whispering to the earth, you create a harmless tiny natural miracle. There are an infinite number of possibilities, but here are some examples: - Make a flower blossom - Create a puff of wind, the sound of a small animal, or the faint odor of a skunk - Light or snuff out a candle, a torch, or a small campfire.

rewards.name: Golem Crystal
rewards.instructions: Can be used by an artificer to animate a golem, worth 200c

rewards.name: Herbalist's Pack
rewards.instructions: Contains items needed to collect herbs and brew teas, as well as cook's utensils, a mess kit, traveler's clothes, a tinderbox, and 50 ft of rope. All herbs you collect take no gear slots.

rewards.name: Load-bearing
grantsAbilities: You have a powerful build. You can carry an extra 4 items.

rewards.name: Nature's Remedies Set
rewards.instructions:
**Learning recipes.** You can either choose to brew a recipe you already know, or experiment with learning a new one. Make an NTU check with a medium difficulty DC. On a success, you learn and brew a new remedy. The herb bundle is always consumed. 

**Brew tonic.** With training, no check. The herb bundle is always consumed. You can spend 1 hour brewing a remedy and sharing it over a conversation with a number of people equal to your tier.

multiRewards.name: Slow
grantsAbilities: decrease the target's speed by half

rewards.name: Wildshape
rewards.instructions:
Transform into a beast up to one tier below your own.

You must create the creature's stats before the game. It shares the same mental skills you do, including your mental pools. Use a d20, a d12, and a d8 for the physical skills, and give it up to three features. Add modifiers equal to half your level.

When any pool hits zero, you revert to your original form, carrying over extra damage.  Costs an amount of wellspring equal to your tier.

rewards.name: Wise Wallop
rewards.instructions: A melee weapon of your choice uses NTU. No check required.

rewards.name: Parchment
rewards.instructions: 1 sheet

rewards.name: Merchant's Scale
rewards.instructions: A scale includes a small balance, pans, and a suitable assortment of weights up to 2 pounds. With it, you can measure the exact weight of small objects, such as raw precious metals or trade goods, to help determine their worth.

multiRewards.name: Vex
multiRewards.advantageMsg: on all checks against this target by you

multiRewards.name: Sap
grantsAbilities: all allies have advantage on the next action the target takes

multiRewards.name: Vex
multiRewards.advantageMsg: on all checks against this target by you

multiRewards.name: Sap
grantsAbilities: all allies have advantage on the next action the target takes

multiRewards.name: Sap
grantsAbilities: all allies have advantage on the next action the target takes

multiRewards.name: Push
grantsAbilities: push the target 1 zone away

multiRewards.name: Slow
grantsAbilities: decrease the target's speed by half

rewards.name: Feed
rewards.instructions: 1 day of animal feed

rewards.name: Donkey
rewards.instructions:
STR d20 | AGI d12 | END d20 
EDU d8 | INS d10 | SOC d10

multiRewards.name: Beast of Burden
grantsAbilities: +4 gear slots

rewards.name: Mastiff
rewards.instructions:
Small creatures can ride a mastiff as a mount

STR d20 | AGI d20 | END d12

EDU d8 | INS d10 | SOC d10

rewards.name: Pony
rewards.instructions:
STR d20 | AGI d12 | END d20 
EDU d8 | INS d10 | SOC d10

rewards.name: Camel
rewards.instructions:
STR d20 | AGI d10 | END d20
EDU d8 | INS d12 | SOC d10

rewards.name: Riding Horse
rewards.instructions:
STR d20 | AGI d12 | END d20 
EDU d8 | INS d10 | SOC d10

multiRewards.name: Beast of Burden
grantsAbilities: +4 gear slots

rewards.name: Barding
rewards.instructions: Armor for a mount. Cost 4x the normal armor price.

rewards.name: Giant Riding Frog
rewards.instructions:
STR d20 | AGI d10 | END d20 
EDU d8 | INS d12 | SOC d10

multiRewards.name: Beast of Burden
grantsAbilities: +4 gear slots

rewards.name: Priest's Pack
rewards.instructions: Includes a blanket, a tinderbox, an alms box, vestments, and a waterskin

rewards.name: Status Signets
rewards.instructions: These silver rings often come in pairs and indicate the well-being of its wearer. If you and another friendly creature you can see are wearing these rings within three zones each other, you are magically aware of the other creature's current number of hit points and condition.

rewards.name: Oathsworn
rewards.instructions:
You have sworn a sacred oath, and its power grants you mystical ability. Your spellcasting modifier is **NTU**. You are trained in your oath.

***Pushing the limit.*** If you are out of wellspring, you can attempt to cast again. Make a check with a target of 10 + the feature's level. On a failure, instantly drop to 0 Social pool.

***Breaking your oath.*** Acting against this oath sacrifices your ability to cast spells until you pay penance.

rewards.name: Infestation
grantsAbilities: the target spends its next turn running to a nearby zone

rewards.name: Mana Shield
rewards.durationMsg: until the start of your next turn

rewards.name: Poisonous Skin
rewards.durationMsg: you remain poisonous until this feature has damaged 3 people or 24 hours have passed
rewards.specificMsg: if anyone makes direct skin contact with you they are poisoned
rewards.castTimeMsg: activates after soaking in water for 1 hour

rewards.name: Rite of the Blood Moon
rewards.instructions:
This powerful ritual curse can only be cast under a full moon. Upon an altar outdoors, a creature must be sacrificed, their blood drained, and their heart eaten. No roll is required.

All allies who participate in the ritual transform into bloodthirsty monsters who solve every problem with violence, spare no mercy for any enemy, and do not rest. For the duration, they double all physical pools, and the transformation lasts until the next midnight.

rewards.name: Glyph Crafter
rewards.instructions:
When you come across a magical material, you can learn to cast one of your spells as a ritual. Each new material unlocks 1 spell.

***New Glyphs.*** It takes an hour to harvest, create the chalk, and design the glyph. Uses of the magical chalk are not tracked.

***Casting.*** Drawing the glyph adds 10 minutes to the typical cast time of the spell and costs half the normal wellspring, rounded down.
rewards.castTimeMsg: adds 10 minutes to the typical cast time

rewards.name: Insect Repellent Incense
grantsAbilities: When lit, it burns for 8 hours and repels normal insects in its zone.

rewards.name: Insect Repellent Salve
rewards.instructions: contains an odorless grease that protects wearer against insects for 24 hours. The salve is waterproof. Single use.

rewards.name: Fishing Tackle
rewards.instructions: This kit includes a wooden rod, silken line, corkwood bobbers, steel hooks, lead sinkers, and velvet lures.

rewards.name: Candle of the Deep
rewards.instructions: The flame of this candle is not extinguished when immersed in water. It gives off light and heat like a normal candle. Lasts for 8 hours.

rewards.name: Drowner's Pearl
rewards.instructions: This magic, sickly pearl contains a fragment of life absorbed from a body that sank to the bottom of the sea. While holding this pearl in your mouth, you can survive for 1 additional minute before you suffocate when you run out of breath or begin to choke underwater. Once this property has been used, the pearl turns to dust and is destroyed.

rewards.name: Hempen Rope
rewards.instructions: 50 ft.

rewards.name: Cook's Utensils
rewards.instructions: Cook’s utensils include a metal pot, knives, forks, a stirring spoon, and a ladle.

rewards.name: Woodcarver's Tools
rewards.instructions: Woodcarver’s tools consist of a knife, a gouge, and a small saw.

rewards.name: Cobbler's Tools
rewards.instructions: Cobbler’s tools consist of a hammer, an awl, a knife, a shoe stand, a cutter, spare leather, and thread.

rewards.name: Leatherworker's Tools
rewards.instructions: Leatherworker’s tools include a knife, a small mallet, an edger, a hole punch, thread, and leather scraps.

rewards.name: Brewer's Supplies
rewards.instructions: Brewer’s supplies include a large glass jug, a quantity of hops, a siphon, and several feet of tubing.

rewards.name: Smith's Tools
rewards.instructions: Smith’s tools include hammers, tongs, charcoal, rags, and a whetstone.

rewards.name: Band of Loyalty
rewards.curseMsg: If you are reduced to zero hit points while attuned to a band of loyalty, you instantly die. These rings are favored by spies who can’t afford to fall into enemy hands.

rewards.name: Lock of Trickery
rewards.instructions: This lock appears to be an ordinary lock and comes with a single key. The tumblers in this lock magically adjust to thwart burglars. Dexterity checks made to pick the lock have disadvantage.

rewards.name: Mystery Key
rewards.instructions: A question mark is worked into the head of this key. The key has a 5 percent chance of unlocking any lock into which it’s inserted. Once it unlocks something, the key disappears.

rewards.name: Oaken Candle
rewards.instructions: After burning for 8 hours, the candle is destroyed and an oak tree 30 feet tall grows in its place over the course of 10 minutes. If there isn't enough room for a tree to grow or the candle isn't placed on solid ground, the candle is destroyed without creating a tree.

rewards.name: Immovable Rod
rewards.instructions: Pressing the button on the end causes the rod to become magically fixed in place. Until you or another creature pushes the button again, the rod doesn't move, even if it is defying gravity.

rewards.name: Mossaic Armor
rewards.prefix: this armor is covered depicts a recent event it has seen in mosaic colorful moss

rewards.name: Universal Solvent
rewards.instructions: dissolves adhesive, including Sovereign Glue, single use

rewards.name: Cheater's Coin
grantsAbilities: give whatever result you wish

rewards.name: Ring of the Adventurous Limb
rewards.instructions: If worn on a hand, the entire arm will vanish.  It will return after 24 hours have elapsed.  Roll a d10: 1 - tattoo on arm, 2 - arm injured, 3 - gained a ring, probably a wedding ring, 4 - ring missing, 5-10 - nothing special.  It will have a similar effect on legs

rewards.name: Shot of Wish Spirits
grantsAbilities: Effects of a wish, but only lasts 1d6 rounds. After the effects are over the wish is completely undone

rewards.name: Party Book
grantsAbilities: This book creates audible illusions imitating a party.  The state of the party depends on the page the book is opened to.  If the book is turned to page 1, you'll hear a couple people setting up silverware.  Middle of the book, raucous carousing.  Near the end, mostly snores and a few people taking shots.

rewards.name: Bag of infinite rats
grantsAbilities: pull a rat out of the bag

rewards.name: Book of Epic Boredom
rewards.notes: When read for 5 minutes, DC 15 or fall asleep
grantsAbilities: DC 15 or fall asleep

rewards.name: Dehydrated Beast
rewards.instructions: If thrown into water, expands into a Tier 1 beast, and dissolves when there's nothing left to kill

rewards.name: Oil of Etherealness
grantsAbilities: You and the objects you carry become ethereal for 1 hour

rewards.name: Sovereign Glue
rewards.instructions: permanent adhesive bond between two things, takes 1 minute to set. Oil of etherealness, universal solvent, or a wish breaks it

rewards.name: Black Cigarette
grantsAbilities: create a cloud of smoke in your zone, you can see through smoke and fog
rewards.notes: When smoked, it creates a huge cloud of smoke and allows the smoker to see through smoke and fog.  Can be smoked for 5 minutes, single use.
rewards.durationMsg: can smoke the cigarette for 5 minutes

rewards.name: Dust of De-Appearance
grantsAbilities: makes something invisible, but wears off if it moves or is moved

rewards.name: Psychic Paper
rewards.instructions: When shown to a person, induces them to see whatever the user wishes them to see on it

rewards.name: Vial of Nightshade
rewards.instructions: When drunk, it puts the body into a deep coma and ejects the spirit.  You can now roam around, incorporeal, until you return to your body.  There is a 1-in-6 chance each hour that some mishap befalls you (body possessed by an outsider, soul lost forever, etc).  Coma lasts for 1d3 days.

rewards.name: Harbinger of the Black Sails
grantsAbilities: deals 4 points against a creature you have sworn vengeance against. You may swear vengeance to one creature per day

rewards.name: Vengeful Glare
rewards.instructions: paralyze a creature in the current zone you have sworn vengeance against. Make a check to maintain the effect if a creature attempts to help them. When the paralysis ends, the target is frightened of you and cannot attack you for 1 minute.

rewards.name: Hunger of Hadar
grantsAbilities: snuffs out all light sources, blinded, area is difficult terrain

rewards.name: Witness Lantern
rewards.instructions: Allows you to replay memories of the past if the lantern was present for those events.

rewards.name: Change Weather
grantsAbilities: change the weather to a natural state of your choosing

rewards.name: Stormweaver

multiRewards.name: Change Weather
grantsAbilities: change the weather to a natural state of your choosing

rewards.instructions: You may perform one of the following

rewards.name: Lightning Bolt
rewards.instructions: deal 2 points

rewards.name: Wild Mushroom
rewards.instructions:
Random effect when consumed (1d6) 

1. Immune 5 rounds to [1. fire 2. cold 3. electricity 4. poison]
2. Heals a pool of your choice 1d4
3. Turn into a newt for 1d4 rounds
4. Take 1 END damage
5. Fly speed 1 for 1d4 rounds
6. Speak to animals for 1d4 hours

rewards.name: Thunderwave
grantsAbilities: target is pushed 1 zone away from you

rewards.name: Overtaking Thorn
rewards.instructions: grapple a humanoid sized creature and pierce their skin. If the creature is not freed in 3 rounds, they become a vine blight

rewards.name: Soldier's Whistle
rewards.notes: Those who blow the whistle find themselves plagued by vivid nightmares of the fallen, their screams echoing through the darkness. Over time, the bearer becomes consumed by guilt and despair, haunted by the faces of those they inadvertently led to their demise.
rewards.instructions:
When blown, it emits a haunting, spectral melody that brings memories of war-torn battlefields. Soldiers who hear its mournful tune are both mesmerized and terrified, unable to resist its call.

Target 11. On success, you have advantage to defend against creatures with a military background that heard its call for the next minute.

rewards.name: Gauntlets of Ogre Power
rewards.instructions: Your STR dice is a d12 while you wear these gauntlets. They have no effect on you if your STR is already a d12 or d20

rewards.name: Moon-Touched Sword
rewards.instructions:
deal 3 points

***Light.*** Target 10 INS to light up 1 zone for 1 hour. On fail, take 1 INS damage.

rewards.name: Light
grantsAbilities: lights up 1 zone for 1 hour

rewards.name: Gore
rewards.instructions: deal 3 points. If you moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 1 damage, and the target must succeed on a target 12 saving throw or be knocked prone if it is a creature

rewards.name: Entangling Plants
rewards.instructions: make 1 zone into difficult terrain, costs 1 wellspring

rewards.name: Rot Grub Bites
rewards.instructions:
a rot grub burrows into the target's skin.  deals 1 AGI damage at the end of their turn unless fire is applied to the bite wound to kill the rot grub. 

If a target infested by rot grubs ends its turn with 0 hit points, it dies as the rot grubs burrow into its heart and kill it.

upcast.name: Upcast: Stun

rewards.name: Animated Shield
rewards.instructions:
trained in defense, advantage on defense, lasts 1 minute, costs 1 wellspring

While holding this shield, you can speak its command word. The shield leaps into the air and hovers in your space to protect you as if you were wielding it, leaving your hands free. The shield remains animated for 1 minute, until you end this effect or until you are incapacitated or die, at which point the shield falls to the ground or into your hand if you have one free.

rewards.name: Berserker Axe
rewards.curseMsg: Whenever a hostile creature damages you, you go berserk. While berserk, you must use your action each round to attack a random creature within 1 zone of you. You are berserk until your start your turn with no creatures within 1 zones of you that you can see or hear. As long as you remain cursed, you are unwilling to part with the axe, keeping it within reach at all times.  You have disadvantage on attack rolls with weapons other than this one, unless no foe is within 2 zones of you that you can see or hear.

multiRewards.name: Decapitate
grantsAbilities: when you attack a creature with at least 1 head, you cut off one of the heads and it dies if it can't survive without the lost head. The target is immune to this effect if it is immune to slashing damage, or the DM decides the creature is too big for its head to be cut off (instead taking 5 slashing damage)

rewards.name: Decapitate
grantsAbilities: when you attack a creature with at least 1 head, you cut off one of the heads and it dies if it can't survive without the lost head. The target is immune to this effect if it is immune to slashing damage, or the DM decides the creature is too big for its head to be cut off (instead taking 5 slashing damage)

rewards.name: Amulet of Health
grantsAbilities: your END die is a d12 while you wear this amulet. It has no effect on you if your END is already a d12 or higher

rewards.name: Amulet of the Planes
grantsAbilities: name a location that you are familiar with on another plane of existence, DC 15 EDU, you and up to 8 willing creatures who link hands in a circle appear in or near there. Alternatively, if you know the sigil sequence of a teleportation circle on another plane of existence, this spell can take you to that circle. You can use this spell to banish an unwilling creature of Tier 4 or less to another plane. On a failure, you and each creature and object within 15 feet of you travel to a random destination. Roll a d100. On a 1–60, you travel to a random location on the plane you named. On a 61–100, you travel to a randomly determined plane.

rewards.name: Bag of Devouring
grantsAbilities:
Bag = fake bag of holding; = mouth 4 giant extradim. creature. Turn inside-out 2 close.
Creature senses all contents. Animal/veg matter = devoured & lost. If living being reaches in: 50% chance pulled in.

**Escape:**
Inside creature: Action = DC 15 STR check,
Outside rescue: Action = DC 20 STR check,
Start turn inside = devoured/destroyed

**Storage:**
Can hold 1ft³ inanimate obj,
1x/day = swallows & spits to other plane (GM decides when/where)

If damaged: Bag destroyed → all contents = random loc. on Astral Plane

rewards.name: Bag of Holding
grantsAbilities:
A bag with 10 gear slots, Mouth = 2ft diameter, Item retrieval consumes your actions for 1 minute

If damaged, it is destroyed and contents scatter in Astral, If turned inside out all contents spill out

O² limit: Any creatures in the bag begin to suffocate after 10 minutes

If put in an extradimensional space both items are destroyed, a 1-way gate to the Astral Plane, everything within 10 feet is sucked in and then the gate disappears

rewards.name: Bead of Force
grantsAbilities: A sphere of transparent force then encloses the area for 1 minute, any creature that took damage  is trapped inside this sphere, creatures that did not take damage are pushed outside of the zone. Only breathable air can pass through the sphere’s wall. No attack or other effect can. An enclosed creature can use its action to push against the sphere’s wall, moving the sphere up to half the creature’s walking speed. The sphere can be picked up, and its magic causes it to weigh only 1 pound

rewards.name: Belt of Dwarvenkind
grantsAbilities: your END die is a d20, you can speak, read, and write Dwarvish

Embroidered silk and velvet mantle set with numerous moonstones
Platinum bracelet set with a sapphire
Embroidered glove set with jewel chips
Gold circlet set with four aquamarines
Eye patch with a mock eye set in blue sapphire and moonstone
A necklace string of small pink pearls
Small gold statuette set with rubies
Gold jewelry box with platinum filigree
Jade game board with solid gold playing pieces
Bejeweled ivory drinking horn with gold filigree
Streetmaster

rewards.name: Cyberdeck
rewards.instructions: enables Netrunning, includes Virtuality Goggles

rewards.name: Pistol Magazine
rewards.instructions: ammo

rewards.name: Rifle Magazine
rewards.instructions: ammo

rewards.name: Jungle Reaper
rewards.flavor: An assault rifle manufactured by Chadran Arms

rewards.name: Rattle Can
rewards.flavor: A cheap, mass-produced grenade launcher by GunMart that makes a lot of noise but doesn't pack much punch

rewards.name: Kerenzikov
grantsAbilities: permanently change your position in the initiative order
rewards.flavor: Chipware, requires Neural Implant

rewards.name: Neural Implant
grantsAbilities: consists of Neural Link (allows you to install chipware) and Interface Plugs (allows you to mentally control machinery)

rewards.name: Chemical Analyzer
grantsAbilities: test substance for chemical composition and compare it to a database

rewards.name: Junkblaster
rewards.flavor: A street trash shotgun made by Scavvers which is prone to violently backfiring

rewards.name: Warlock
rewards.trainedMsg: Pact Magic. Your spellcasting ability is SOC
rewards.flavor: You draw magic from a patron with whom you have made a pact

multiRewards.name: Pactbound
multiRewards.instructions: Displeasing your warlock patron blocks your ability to cast spells until they are appeased.

multiRewards.name: Pushing the Limit
multiRewards.instructions: If you are out of wellspring, you can still attempt to cast. On a fail, you drop to 0 spellcasting pool.

multiRewards.name: Pushing the Limit

rewards.trainedMsg: Spellcasting. Your spellcasting ability is SOC
rewards.flavor: You channel the magic of music, dance, or verse

multiRewards.name: Dissonance
multiRewards.instructions: If you roll a 1 on your ability die when spellcasting, all creatures who can hear you become deaf for 1 minute

multiRewards.name: Pushing the Limit
multiRewards.instructions: If you are out of wellspring, you can still attempt to cast. On a fail, you drop to 0 spellcasting pool.

rewards.name: Dissonance
rewards.instructions: If you roll a 1 on your ability die when spellcasting, all creatures who can hear you become deaf for 1 minute

rewards.name: Bounce Back
rewards.flavor: Auto-injector
rewards.instructions: (action) heals 1 point each round for 3 rounds, single use

rewards.name: MaxDoc
rewards.flavor: An inhaler manufactured by Trauma Team

rewards.name: Black Lace
grantsAbilities: sets your Endurance die to a d20
adds +4 to the pool's current and max
rewards.flavor: 27% dextromethamphetamine, 15% cannabinoid, 40% water, and 8% chemical ingredients of unknown origin. Potential reactions include altered states of consciousness, panic attacks, elevated heart rates, dehydration, and heart attacks.

rewards.name: Agent
rewards.instructions: Self-adaptive-AI powered smartphone. Can surf the Data Pool and recommend a future course of action based on your personal goals. AI may suggest unwise actions.

rewards.name: Flashlight
rewards.instructions: Rechargeable. Lasts up to 10 hours on a charge.

rewards.name: Medscanner
rewards.flavor: Scanner with external probes and contacts that diagnoses injury and illnes
rewards.advantageMsg: on medical checks when assisting someone ill or injured

rewards.name: Nylon Rope
rewards.instructions: 50 ft.

rewards.name: Techscanner
rewards.flavor:
Scanner diagnoses a wide variety of electronics, assisting the user in repairs, or
other technical work.

rewards.name: Alchemist's Supplies
rewards.instructions:
It's up to you to harvest materials you think have alchemical properties. The materials are consumed on success or failure.

***Learning Formulas (T0).*** You can either choose to create a formula you already know, or experiment with learning a new one. Make a medium difficulty check. On a success, you learn and brew a new formula.

***Craft potion or poison (T0).*** Takes 1 hour. If trained, no check is required.

shops.name: Swampbottom's
shops.description: In the Jadeway Towers neighborhood, one of the spiraling buildings, made by grungs from green goo dredged up from the river.

shops.name: Sully's Steelworks
shops.description: The interior is fastidiously kept, with a swept floor, items for sale displayed neatly on the walls. Materials are tucked away into organized bins. They seem to be largely empty.

shops.name: United Underfolk Church
shops.description: Axes and swords are bent into an arch up on dais. Area to the right where a small collection of holy supplies are sold.

shops.name: The Endless Maze
shops.description: Stone structure painted a cheery yellow. A maze! 7 foot tall shelves are jam-packed with essentials. Finding the counter a challenge.

shops.name: Diverse Diversions
shops.description: Drab. Cob. Mud and clay structure. Two roots stick out from the second story.  Small selection of instruments hanging from the walls, and a table of gaming sets.

shops.name: Rummage & Things
shops.description: Precarious, shabby, ramshackle. Bins are filled with random things, no organization. At the counter, there is a small selection of items behind glass. Random trinkets are sold for 1d6 cp. Make a chance roll to see if an item you are looking for is in stock.

shops.name: Lilith's Love Hut
shops.description: Small, rundown. Small Bar, narrow hallway draped by silks branching off into separate rooms

shops.name: Smoltra
shops.description: Smoltra works with lizard leather, hunted from the nearby jungle, the Bondow Wilds. Since Smoltra doesn't have a store front, her goods are made-to-order.

shops.name: Margaret
shops.description: A seamstress and weaver who happens to be a drider. Everything Margaret makes is custom and made to order. Special customizations may increase the price.

services.name: Accommodation, dorm
services.description: Staying in a common area with strangers. May be mats on the floor or bunks.
